meanings.definition: The quality or state of being redolent.
meanings.sent1: The redolences of the flowers filled the room with a sweet scent.
meanings.sent2: I love the redolences of fresh bread baking in the oven.
meanings.sent3: The redolences of the perfume were so strong that they tickled my nose.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking always carries the redolences of her grandmother's recipes.
meanings.sent5: The redolences of the forest after the rain were enchanting.

meanings.sent1: The redolences of the bakery made my mouth water.
meanings.sent2: The redolences of the ocean always remind me of summer vacations.
meanings.sent3: The redolences of the freshly brewed coffee woke me up instantly.
meanings.sent4: The redolences of nostalgia filled the air as we walked through the old town.
meanings.sent5: The redolences of the flowers in the garden were simply delightful.
